name: Donut Arena (itch)
description:
Steam Version
  • You can save your progress
  • All future updates and bug fixes
  • Friend's leaderboard
Gameplay Features
  • Complex mechanics with lots of possibilities
  • Countless strategies and builds to try out
  • Reach the 0.1% best scores to earn the PRO title
  • Leaderboard to compare your highest score with friends (Steam version only)
  • Full controller support
Beginner Tips
  • The crowd drops armor and helmets in the easiest arena
  • Press ESC to learn about the new items you discover
  • Throwing is safer than striking, it doesn't slow you down
  • Try different sequences of underwears

Developer's note: "Hi, my name is Mario (not the super one!), and I'm the solo developer of Donut Arena. A game that took me 5 years to finish and that I always wanted to play, but didn't exist. The game objective is simple: reach the highest scores by eating lots of donuts. For that, you should be surprised with the amount of possible builds and strategies to try out. Be creative!

The soundtrack was produced by Marcos Mello. You can listen to it here.

Thanks for playing, hope you enjoy it!"
